author: jwasinger
content: I've tried to implement this in Geth, but it makes the parallel-execution+stateroot codepath so convoluted that I don't think it's worth it unless it can somehow be done cleanly :/

author: jwasinger
content: the reason it makes it convoluted is because we have to continue tx execution and state root computation even after we hit a mismatch that would render the block invalid.

author: jwasinger
content: it's not entirely infeasible.  I think it just makes the code harder to reason about, and it's already pretty nontrivial
